EmailTemplate.description: For Potential New Customers that came to booth at a trade show
EmailTemplate.name: TradeShow - New Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Follow up with {!Lead.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName}
Please note that this customer stopped by the Office Depot booth at the MedAssets Conference recently.
Please reach out to the contact listed and thank them for stopping by and see if they have any needs or concerns. Please follow up with me via email as I will be tracking leads and responses.
Thank you in advance for your assistance and I look forward to your follow up email.
